short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension extends the export functionality of the BlueSky Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use BlueSky for your CPD / Training / Performance Management? Need to output Lesson Observations with notes / comments? Want to monitor Shared Journals using a spreadsheet? This the extension for you.

It needs no configuration or setup, extending your BlueSky report options simply and easily. It is safe and secure, working entirely on your device and in your browser.
